explains: n. 食肉动物；喜欢吃肉的人，食肉动物（诙谐说法）

sentences.en: You describe yourself as a born-again carnivore.
sentences.cn: 你把自己描述成重生的食肉动物。

sentences.en: It's a gharial, perhaps the largest terrestrial carnivore ever to walk the earth, larger than T-Rex.
sentences.cn: 这是一条长吻鄂，可能是地球上有史以来最大的陆地食肉动物，比霸王龙还要大。

sentences.en: The polar bear is the largest terrestrial carnivore, being more than twice as big as the Siberian Tiger!
sentences.cn: 北极熊是陆地上最大的肉食性动物，比西伯利亚虎都要大两倍多！
